amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 134 which prohibits the use of funds to develop, issue, or implement any regulation that increases levels of minimum financial responsibility for transporting passengers or property as in effect on January 1, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 134 which prohibits the use of funds to develop, issue, or implement any regulation that increases levels of minimum financial responsibility for transporting passengers or property as in effect on January 1, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 247 (Roll no. 301).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 247 (Roll no. 301).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
